title: Herb Lubalin Font Name
content:
Does anyone know the name of this Herb Lubalin font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130825im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/lubalin_5671.jpg)

Thanks

 [‹ New carlsberg font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130825/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45522 "Go to previous forum topic") [Trying to identify a font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130825/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45515 "Go to next forum topic")
author: VisualPollution

comments.content:
Related: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376140480/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130825/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376140480/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376140480/")

The apostrophes in this sample are upside-down, btw.

Wow...it’s Stilla and non a Lubalin font!  
Sorry, it’s my fault!

Thank you so much guys!
